column1: '''''The Tolkien Calendar 1987''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] in [[1986]]. It features art by [[Roger Garland]], [[John Howe]], [[Alan Lee]] and [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
